tool_description: Rugby sport Api, where you can get news articles, live scores and specific tournament news
name: RugbyInfo
title: RugbyInfo

api_list.name: live Scores
api_list.description: gets the live scores of the currently playing games
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugbyinfo.p.rapidapi.com/liveScores"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugbyinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Competition News
api_list.description: This endpoint gets articles on a specified competition
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rugbyinfo.p.rapidapi.com/competitionNews/six nations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugbyinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rugbyinfo.p.rapidapi.com/competitionNews/{competition}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rugbyinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
